text:
Hi Keith,

I have major apologies to make here, I'm really sorry for not replying sooner. I intend to be in touch with you much more.

I hope you had a lovely time over the holidays and a happy new year.

I thought it might be good to start off by sending you links to my portfolio, Youtube and Twitter accounts.
Portfolio: <http://3dvfxkid.wixsite.com/3dcharlie5735|3dvfxkid.wixsite.com/3dcharlie5735>
Twitter: <http://twitter.com/3DVFXkid|twitter.com/3DVFXkid>
Youtube: <http://www.youtube.com/channel/UCb1Zux79t44RhBKplKFYMZg|www.youtube.com/channel/UCb1Zux79t44RhBKplKFYMZg>
I don't put all the work that I do online as I'm constantly tinkering and playing around (while crashing my computer :laughing:) and I just forget to update it. Most of the work I do is in Blender.

I also attend an animation camp in London each year in the summer where 3 groups of 9 students (including me) make a film from start to finish in 7 days, those are the ones on my portfolio marked 3Dami.

I would love to hear feedback you have on the work I've posted? And if you have any questions about any of it just ask.

Thank you,
Kind regards
Charlie
